TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to destroy the weapon. You must try again.
You have destroyed the weapon. Hopefully Gruulkar is not building any more.
The Council of Merchants in Dhun-Kor reward you for your bravery.
You must go to the village of Snake Fang in search of the weapon.
You must now return to Dhun-Kor for your reward.
Gruulkar is building some form of giant catapult. It looks like it is designed to hurl Goblins long distances.
